original_text: As they went away, Jesus began to speak to the crowds concerning John: “What did you go out into the wilderness to see? A reed shaken by the wind?
korean_text: 그들이 떠나매 예수께서 무리에게 요한에 대하여 말씀하시되 너희가 무엇을 보려고 광야에 나갔더냐 바람에 흔들리는 갈대냐

sentences.original_text: Jesus began to speak to the crowds
“What did you go out into the wilderness to see?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 광야에 보러 나간 것이 무엇이냐?

sentences.original_text: A reed shaken by the wind?
